page.title: 09Superstitions
page.content: We visited a school to ask some children about their villages. We asked them if they knew any old wives tales. Here are some of the more interesting ones we were told of. They say that when you are pregnant if you eat{strawberries}then your baby will have a mark of a strawberry. This must cause some concern in a fruit-growing area such as ours! The well-known superstition about it being bad luck to walk under a ladder is offered a solution in this area. When you come out from under the ladder you should cross your fingers in order to regain good luck. If you find a pot of salt upset on a table you should pick a pinch up and throw it over your shoulder. What good this does you is unclear!
